## node1 variable

Similar to `node()`<!-- -->, but optimized for nodes using only a single input. Uses "src" as default input ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
node1: (xform?: Transducer<any, any> | undefined, inputID?: string) => NodeFactory<any>
```
